divs: Sighting DetailsMy dogs were barking, so I took my camcorder out on the front porch with me, to see what they were going on about, i didnt see anything, while i was looking up in the sky the phone rang an it was my niece, she asked me what i was doing i said looking for ufos, an out of nowhere here came a Bright Egg shaped Object, filled with orange colors, sailing across the western sky..it was low, no sound at all.it was a Ery feeling, as I filmed it..after it was gone, I was up scared,up till about 3am so i went to my computer, an seen it was messing up..acting real strange,then i went to bed an my dogs barked off an on the rest of the night wakeing me, scareing me more.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Richmond
There was one other sighting in Richmond on or around July 27th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Orange/ white Egg shaped Object..sailing slowly an Low ..no sound,,
